title: MetricRange
description: The MetricRange component is used to add a custom area mark onto visualizations. MetricRange is only supported for Line components. When creating a MetricRange you define a metricStart and metricEnd for the range that controls the area of the chart it will cover. You can also provide a Metric to create an additional line within the MetricRange. This metric line is not a Trendline and will only display with the data you provide to the Chart.
